MailAction.Question: Please provide your satisfaction score below to help us improve the level of service.

Email.focus:
Your Service Ticket #12526 regarding "Testing Ticket" has been completed by our help desk staff.
If you feel this ticket is not complete, please reply to this email or contact the help desk for further assistance.
Email.closing:
Please submit additional requests in a separate ticket.
Regards,
Managed Services Department

Questions.question: How much do you like us to recommend to other companies?
Questions.heading: Recommendation

Questions.question: How happy are you with the speed at which we provide support to you?
Questions.heading: Promptness

Questions.question: How satisfied are you with our attention to detail?
Questions.heading: Accuracy

QuestionPage.heading: Thanks for providing your valuable feedback
QuestionPage.description: Client satisfaction is very important to us and we greatly appreciate your feedback in this area. Please tell us what we need to work on. Your response will be used to improve the quality of our services

ThankyouPage.Description: If you would really "go out of your way" to recommend us we would love to get a testimonial from you and have you share this with your colleagues.
